verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, In the third לְצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> le-Tzet were gone forth בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom the same day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, they בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u came מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar they [into] the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai. of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U For they were departed מֵרְפִידִ֗ים <S%H7508><s%> me-re-fi-Dim, from Rephidim וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and were come מִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar [to] the desert סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai, of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and had pitched בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וַיִּֽחַן־ <S%H2583><s%> vai-yi-chan- camped שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham and there יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and there Israel נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged front הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har. before the mount

וּמֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> u-mo-Sheh And Moses עָלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah went up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; unto God וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav and to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har unto him out of the mountain לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus תֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> to-Mar Thus shalt thou say לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit to the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob וְתַגֵּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> ve-tag-Geid and tell לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you רְאִיתֶ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem, Ye have seen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti what I did לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> le-mitz-Ra-yim; Egyptian וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa and [how] I bare אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> kan-Fei wings נְשָׁרִ֔ים <S%H5404><s%> ne-sha-Rim, you on eagles' וָאָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> va-'a-Vi and brought אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Mo-a' Now therefore if ye will obey תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> tish-me-'U indeed בְּקֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li, my voice וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֑י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti; my covenant וִהְיִ֨יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> vih-Yi-tem become לִ֤י li סְגֻלָּה֙ <S%H5459><s%> se-gul-Lah then ye shall be a peculiar treasure מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, unto me above all people כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לִ֖י li כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. for all the earth

וְאַתֶּ֧ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תִּהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> tih-yu- become לִ֛י li מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4467><s%> mam-Le-chet And ye shall be unto me a kingdom כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> ko-ha-Nim of priests וְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> ve-Goy nation קָד֑וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh; and an holy אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh another הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim, These [are] the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תְּדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-Ber which thou shalt speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called לְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> le-zik-Nei for the elders הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; of the people וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and laid לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem, before their faces אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-hu commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. which the LORD

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol All הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh; we will do וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei the words הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba Lo I come אֵלֶיךָ֮ <S%H413><s%> 'e-lei-Cha unto בְּעַ֣ב <S%H5645><s%> be-'Av unto thee in a thick הֶֽעָנָן֒ <S%H6051><s%> he-'a-Nan cloud בַּעֲב֞וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur so יִשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma' may hear הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am that the people בְּדַבְּרִ֣י <S%H1696><s%> be-dab-be-Ri when I speak עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, you וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and may also בְּךָ֖ be-Cha יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ya-'a-Mi-nu with thee and believe לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; thee for ever וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged told מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei the words הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, unto the people וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ם <S%H6942><s%> ve-kid-dash-Tam and sanctify הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom them to day וּמָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> u-ma-Char; and to morrow וְכִבְּס֖וּ <S%H3526><s%> ve-chib-be-Su and let them wash שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8071><s%> sim-lo-Tam. their clothes

וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become נְכֹנִ֖ים <S%H3559><s%> ne-cho-Nim And be ready לַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> lai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi; against the third כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, for the third יֵרֵ֧ד <S%H3381><s%> ye-Red will come down יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of all the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har upon mount סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai. Sinai

וְהִגְבַּלְתָּ֤ <S%H1379><s%> ve-hig-bal-Ta And thou shalt set bounds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הִשָּׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> hish-sha-me-Ru Take heed לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem עֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> a-Lot to yourselves [that ye] go [not] up בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har into the mount וּנְגֹ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> u-ne-Go-a' or touch בְּקָצֵ֑הוּ <S%H7097><s%> be-ka-Tze-hu; the border כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> han-no-Ge-a' of it whosoever toucheth בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har the mount מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. put to death

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No תִגַּ֨ע <S%H5060><s%> tig-Ga' touch בּ֜וֹ bo יָ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> Yad, There shall not an hand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for סָק֤וֹל <S%H5619><s%> sa-Kol it but he shall surely יִסָּקֵל֙ <S%H5619><s%> yis-sa-Kel be stoned אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or יָרֹ֣ה <S%H3384><s%> ya-Roh shot יִיָּרֶ֔ה <S%H3384><s%> yi-ya-Reh, through אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or בְּהֵמָ֥ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah whether [it be] beast אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo No יִחְיֶ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh; it shall not live בִּמְשֹׁךְ֙ <S%H4900><s%> bim-shoCh soundeth long הַיֹּבֵ֔ל <S%H3104><s%> hai-yo-Vel, when the trumpet הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they יַעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu they shall come up בָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> va-Har. to the mount

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red went down מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har from the mount אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; unto the people וַיְקַדֵּשׁ֙ <S%H6942><s%> vay-kad-Desh and sanctified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, the people וַֽיְכַבְּס֖וּ <S%H3526><s%> vay-chab-be-Su and they washed שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8071><s%> sim-lo-Tam. their clothes

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, unto the people הֱי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> he-Yu Be נְכֹנִ֖ים <S%H3559><s%> ne-cho-Nim ready לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> lish-Lo-shet against the third יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; day אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H5066><s%> tig-ge-Shu come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah. not at [your] wives

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> vai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi And it came to pass on the third בִּֽהְיֹ֣ת <S%H1961><s%> bih-Yot came הַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> hab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came קֹלֹ֨ת <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lot that there were thunders וּבְרָקִ֜ים <S%H1300><s%> u-ve-ra-Kim and lightnings וְעָנָ֤ן <S%H6051><s%> ve-'a-Nan cloud כָּבֵד֙ <S%H3515><s%> ka-Ved and a thick עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, upon the mount וְקֹ֥ל <S%H6963><s%> ve-Kol and the voice שֹׁפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far of the trumpet חָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> cha-Zak loud מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; exceeding וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <S%H2729><s%> vai-ye-che-Rad trembled כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am so that all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. that [was] in the camp
